ComicInfo.Title: No Time Like the Present
ComicInfo.Series: DC Horror Presents: Sgt. Rock vs. the Army of the Dead
ComicInfo.Summary: Berlin, 1944. The Nazis are besieged on all fronts by the Allied forces. Defeat is inevitable. But Hitler and his team of evil scientists attempt a last-ditch effort that may turn the tide of the war and rewrite history itself: a serum that resurrects their dead soldiers, stronger than they were in life, and sends them back into the battlefield. Now Sgt. Frank Rock and Easy Company have been dispatched into enemy territory to face off against the strangest, most horrific enemies they’ve ever encountered: Nazi zombies! Horror icon Bruce Campbell and comics legend Eduardo Risso bring you a terror-soaked Sgt. Rock tale like no other!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-15 21:23:59. [CVDB949140]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brad Anderson, Charlie Adlard, Chris Mooneyham, Francesco Francavilla, Frank Quitely, Gary Frank, Pia Guerra
ComicInfo.Characters: Adolf Hitler, Bulldozer, Long Round, Sgt. Rock, Short Round
ComicInfo.Teams: Easy Company, Nazis, United States Army, Zombies
